title: Will there ever be left hand turn signals at the intersection of Antionette Rd and Carolina Beach Rd ? The people coming out of Wal-Mart turning left on Carolina Beach Rd going south and the people turning left onto Carolina Beach Rd going north do not use their turn signals and will turn left in front of you.
text:
Not that we can find out right now. But if there is any decisions
made on that particular area, we'll post it online and in the
StarNews.
